```{r}

#change to data directory
setwd("/Users/farerilab/Documents/GitHub/SLA_Empathy/filtered/")

#read in data file
SLA_Empathy1_30<-read.csv(file = "SLA_Empathy_allsubs_NAs.csv", header = TRUE)

#list variables in dataset
ls(SLA_Empathy1_30)

#load in requisite libraries
library(sjPlot)
library(sjmisc)
library(sjstats)
library(sjlme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(ggplot2)


#run basic analysis
glm2<-glmer(Response~Amount1 + Amount2 + Certain + Partner + (1|Subject), data = SLA_Empathy1_30, family = binomial(link=logit))

summary(glm2)

plot_model(model=glm2,type=c("pred"))

glm3<-glmer(Response~Amount1 + Amount2 + Certain + Partner + SNS + (1|Subject), data = SLA_Empathy1_30, family = binomial(link=logit))

summary(glm3)

plot_model(model=glm3, type=c("pred"))
```
